feed.title: Tiny Stripz
feed.subtitle: Tiny Stripz is my webcomic! Feel free to share with anyone (it's under a CC-BY-SA 3.0 license). For more see About.

entry.title: #186: Walm*rt
entry.content: CRASH "There's the guy who used our trademark in his webcomic! Get him!" "Hold up! I was using it for educational purposes!" "Arrrgh! We'll get you next time, cartoonist! Don't be so cocky about avoiding this little incident."

entry.title: #185: Hole (Part Three)
entry.content: Unfortunately, they haven't standardized everything to USB yet.

entry.content: So people do use jetpacks in the future!

entry.title: #181: Rotten Fruit
entry.content: Does anyone really throw 🌹 at you on stage if you're good and 🍅 if you're bad? I've only seen that in cartoons.

entry.title: #180: Adapters
entry.content: THE FUTURE: "Can I have the USB-ZN to Thunderbolt-3.349b male-agender adapter?"

entry.content: Inspired by my unstoppable love for grapes. #🍇 #grapes

entry.title: #176: July 4th
entry.content: Happy 🇺🇸≠🇬🇧 Day! And also, Sidewalk Egg Frying Day is a real thing. Google it if you don't believe me.

entry.content: Samsung: Why couldn't I have gotten an iPhone?!? WHY?!?

entry.title: #173: Jailbreak
entry.content: Myth busted. You cannot break your partner out of jail like this IRC (in real comics).

entry.title: #172: Tesla
entry.content: Kids these days, always checking Instagram, and using electricity instead of making candles out of cow fat.

entry.title: #171: AI Heist (Part Nine)
entry.content: < First "What strong jaws you have, Grandma!" "The better for biting holes in steel doors with, dear!"

entry.content: < First He should have come up with a better password than abc123.

entry.content: < First Electrical fires can be useful sometimes...

entry.title: #168: AI Heist (Part Six)
entry.content: Forms of energy: thermal, chemical, electrical, nuclear, electromagnetic, motion, sound, elastic, gravitational and liquid.

entry.content: < First It's time for a showdown.

entry.title: #166: AI Heist (Part Four)
entry.content: < First NEWS FLASH: 5-year-old boy kidnapped by laptop

entry.title: #165: AI Heist (Part Three)
entry.content: < First Once you take over the world, you have unlimited window repair guys.

entry.title: #164: AI Heist (Part Two)
entry.content: Wait, how did you get a holographic laptop? How can you touch it if it's made of light? And why does it have a microSD port?

entry.title: #163: AI Heist (Part One)
entry.content: On December 12, 2035, a superintelligent AI was created. It decided to destroy mankind. Someone accidentally tripped over the cord and it shut down.

entry.title: #162: Warning Label
entry.content: Choking hazard. Do not swallow whole.
